description:
Kenshi —half-brother of intergalactic hero Tenchi Masaki— has been summoned to the mysterious world of Geminar, and his only hope of returning to Earth is piloting a bio-mechanical weapon in a shocking assassination attempt! When the mission fails and Kenshi is captured, he discovers he's been lied to by the very culprits who transported him to this strange new world. Luckily, Princess Lashara kindly welcomes Kenshi and invites him to live amongst her followers. Now, caught up in a political whirlwind —and hotly pursued by Geminar's female population— Kenshi must find a way to get home while civil war erupts all around him!

(Source: FUNimation)

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

name.native: アウラ・シュリフォン
ワウアンリー・シュメ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/marchimark) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jamiemarchi/)

An American voice actress, ADR director, and script writer who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. She grew up in Oklahoma and graduated from the University of Oklahoma with a bachelor's degree in theater, starting her professional acting career in 2000. She married fellow actor Sean T. Perez on August 8, 1999, and they divorced on November 21, 2005. Jamie has two step-daughters. Her younger half-brother, [Jean-Luc Hester](https://anilist.co/staff/104094), is also a voice actor.

Worked for Games Gurafikka company until 2003. Since 2004 working as a freelance illustrator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/enonami) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15820)

__Ethnicity:__ Japanese / French-Canadian
__Height:__ 170 cm (5'7)
__Favorite Musicians:__ [Backstreet Boys](https://anilist.co/staff/156215/)
__Favorite Anime:__ [NANA](https://anilist.co/anime/877/), [Paradise Kiss](https://anilist.co/anime/322/)

Seira Kagami is a Japanese singer, actress and model. She goes by Shira Kagami (加賀美聖良) in the acting industry.

She was born Sara Arbour to a French-Canadian father (who is half French and half Polish) and a Japanese mother on June 13, 1987. She grew up in Tokyo, Japan with her two younger sisters and currently holds Dual Citizenship to Canada and Japan. Kagami has stated that though she is fluent in English, she first learned the language in an International School in Japan.

(Souce: Generasia)
Distinguished Japanese animator and director known for his extensive contributions to anime

Currently freelance. Watanabe started his career as an animator at Tsuchida Production, which he left in July 1986 after the studio's bankruptcy. He then joined Studio Gallop, where he was responsible for the character designs and chief animation direction for the studio's mahou shoujo titles such as [Hime-chan no Ribbon](https://anilist.co/anime/2037/), which was his debut as a character designer, [Akazukin Chacha](https://anilist.co/anime/103/) and [Nurse Angel Ririka SOS](https://anilist.co/anime/616/) as well as the hit TV anime series [Kodomo no Omocha](https://anilist.co/anime/1486/).

Frequent collaborator with [Akitarou Daichi](https://anilist.co/staff/100640/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/梶島正樹)

He entered [Studio Junio](https://anilist.co/studio/280/) after graduating from Osaka Design College. Kajishima admired [Kenichi Sonoda](https://anilist.co/staff/97942/)'s designs and came to Tokyo to join the [Gall Force](https://anilist.co/anime/2060/) production team. After Gall Force, he continued to do a bunch of contract work for [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/) as a freelancer and became mainly known for creating the [Tenchi Muyou!](https://anilist.co/anime/696/) universe.

Besides his anime works, he's also written doujinshi and novels.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ei_aoki)

Ei Aoki is a Japanese storyboard artist and director. He credits the anime Megazone 23 as his inspiration to have a career in animation. In 2013, he created the animation studio Troyca with Toshiyuki Nagano and Tomonobu Kato, which began animation production on its first work in the fall of 2014.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/4685307000)

Originating from Studio Giants, currently freelance.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_silmeria_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_silmeria_/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/54631733)
Hideki Furukawa is an animator and animation director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamada_uk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/22HS_drill/) Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). Works outside anime: - Melty Blood: Type Lumina (Video Game, 2021) (Cut-in Animation Character Design, Animation Director, Key Animation)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamada_uk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/22HS_drill/) Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). Works outside anime: - Melty Blood: Type Lumina (Video Game, 2021) (Cut-in Animation Character Design, Animation Director, Key Animation)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/梶島正樹)

He entered [Studio Junio](https://anilist.co/studio/280/) after graduating from Osaka Design College. Kajishima admired [Kenichi Sonoda](https://anilist.co/staff/97942/)'s designs and came to Tokyo to join the [Gall Force](https://anilist.co/anime/2060/) production team. After Gall Force, he continued to do a bunch of contract work for [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/) as a freelancer and became mainly known for creating the [Tenchi Muyou!](https://anilist.co/anime/696/) universe.

Besides his anime works, he's also written doujinshi and novels.
